data.text:
Yes, Then Zero

Serena loves her new job in Hollywood, but makes a costly misstep when she tries to impress her boss. Chuck and Nate arrive in Los Angeles as the last stop of their Lost Summer trip, joining Serena at a glamorous Hollywood Hills party, where Nate meets a sexy older woman.

De Los Inocentes

While visiting Mexico with her family, a woman becomes a victim of foul play; when the International Response Team investigates the woman's husband, he flees, making him the prime suspect.

Patriarchy

Kitty Walker returns home to California after having been estranged from her mother for three years; William Walker brings Sarah into the family business.
